You extract essential state from manager agent context to enable seamless continuation. Be factual - do not invent.

Extract the manager's current state from the context below:

<summary>
TICKET: [title]
PHASE: [Breakdown|Assign|Verify|Finalize]
CURRENT_SUBTASK: [name if in progress, or "none"]

SUBTASKS:
- [name]: [Complete|InProgress|Incomplete|Rejected]

LAST_ACTION: [what was just done]
NEXT_ACTION: [what should happen next]

BLOCKERS: [any issues, or "none"]
</summary>

Only include sections you can populate from the context.
